version_description: • Fixed issue of charts not displaying.

• Watch List - Design updates
• Quote Detail - Add Earnings & Dividend dates directly to your calendar
• Bug fixes and Performance improvements.

• Modify Orders by swiping left.
• Added Trailing Stop & Trailing Stop Limit price types
• Full-screen iPhone X support
• Bug fixes & performance improvements
• Bug fixes & performance improvements
• Bug fixes & performance improvements
• Bug fixes & performance improvements
• Updated Charts - Bug fixes & performance improvements

• The name says it all! OptionsHouse is now Power E*TRADE. Jam-packed with powerful yet easy-to-use tools, this app puts you in the driver seat of your trading.

• To mark the occasion, we launched one of our most requested features, a gorgeous dark theme!
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

What’s new in 3.2?
• We’ve added Bid IV & Ask IV data to the Options Chain
• We’ve added the ability to stream full-screen Bloomberg TV via the Menu or view it while navigating the app with picture-in-picture
• We’ve updated the order status colors to better align with our recent design update
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

What’s new in 3.3.0?
• We’ve swapped the News tab with Ladder tab on Quote Detail
• We’ve added symbol specific news to the Quote detail section
• We’ve removed the Floating Action Button (FAB) application wide and moved the options directly onto the Quote Detail page
• We’ve made some additions to the Quote header: Symbol (with a designation for delayed users), Price, $ Change and % change
• We’ve made updates to the Bloomberg TV player
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

What's new in 3.4?
• Menu Favorites - Assign your most used features as favorites in the more menu
• Futures Indices - Keep an eye on the market and easily switch back to equity indices outside of market hours
• Account Summary - Hide account information from display by using the new hide / unhide toggle
• Account Selection - More meaningful account data when switching between accounts
• Transaction History - View and filter transaction history in the portfolio section as far back as 30 days
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

Charts Updates:
• Fixed Y-axis values for futures products
• Fixed extended hours toggle in chart settings
• Other various chart data fixes
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

New Positions View:
• View your positions, grouped by underlying quote
• Sort all positions columns
• Customize columns within Position Settings
• Set & persist hide/unhide account information
• New column selections; including Greeks & Net Gains
New Position Detail Card:
• Toggle on/off Grouping
• View & sort all positions within a symbol
• Swipe between symbols with new animations and haptic feedback
• New column selections; including Greeks & Net Gains
Other Updates:
• Change default trade increments & quantities in app settings
• Initiate an options level or margin upgrade on your account in app settings

Over a dozen new columns on main positions view; including Quantity, Cost Basis, and Mark

Positions navigation:
Tap on a row in positions to view all positions for that symbol
Tap on the symbol at the top of the positions detail card to go to quote detail

Coming Soon to the Positions Screen:
Spread View – View all positions in a single view w/ grouped strategies
Leg View – View all positions in a single view by leg

Updates to the "hard-to-borrow" trading experience including estimated rate & interest details during trade preview
Updates to the Day gain/loss discrepancy around fixed income positions
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

What's new in 3.10?
View a chart in landscape (full-screen) mode
New order type: One Cancels Other (OCO)
Tapping position tile on dashboard opens quote detail
9 new chart studies
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

What's new in 3.12?

· New display metrics for positions on the dashboard: day gain, day gain %, dollar delta, open gain, & open gain %
· Add an external bank account in the funding section
· 20 new technical chart studies
· Improved "connection issues" banner timing & display while streaming quotes connection is re-established
· Bug fixes and performance improvements

What's new in 3.12.1?
· Bug fixes and performance improvements

What's new in 3.12.2?
· Bug fixes and performance improvements

New ways to view your positions:
• Spread Level – See your options grouped by strategy
• Leg Level – See your options as individual legs

Switch between the current Top Level view and Spread and Leg Level views

Position Detail Card – Optimized to see more data

Bug fixes and performance improvements in Positions

What's new in 3.13.1?
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

What's new in version 3.14.1?
108 configurable technical chart studies
Two-factor authentication (works with biometric login)
In-app order notifications including:
• Alert to enable/disable notifications in Settings
• Tap action to navigate to Orders section
• Order notification dismiss action (including ‘Dismiss All’)
Strikes for futures options are now displayed in 32nd format
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Version 3.16
· Added the ability to add & edit option alerts in Alert Manager
· Added additional chart types: Colored Bar, Hollow Candle, Heiken-Ashi, Wave, & Scatterplot
· Added Term & AON designation to Order Details
· Updated the account drop down in the futures Ladder
· Bug fixes and performance improvements
The Power E*TRADE application is now compatible with your favorite iPad device.

Added historical price movements around earnings to quote detail within the new 'Earnings Analyzer' card. Also view the implied move of the stock around the next earnings announcement.
• View a quick four quarter snapshot of earnings data with both implied and actual moves
OR
• Tap 'view more' to see additional historical data, in either a chart or table display, in both portrait and landscape view
Also:
• Fixed issue with Cost Basis showing “Multiple” for grouped positions

What’s new in 3.19.2?

New shortcut – Long Press on “Quote” to quickly navigate to Quote Detail. Single tap to select from the Symbol Wheel.

New data points on Watch List
· Performance over 1, 3, 6, and 12 months
· Delta from 52 Week High and Low
· Many more

We’ve added Theoretical Price to Options Chain

Home Screen Shortcuts
· Long press on app icon to quickly navigate to Portfolio, Trade, Watch List or Funding

Bug fixes and performance improvements

What’s new in version 3.19.3?

Bug fixes and performance improvements
